segments.text: Oh ! ! My car isn't working . I'm waiting for a tow-truck .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a ride home ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , my wife is coming to get me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good . Do you live near here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , we live in the suburbs . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I live downtown , with my parents .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't need a car . I walk to work .
segments.speaker: S1
